= TPJWildCardFileFilter =

*Project:* [DropFilesComponents Drop Files Components].

*Unit:* _PJDropFiles_.

_TPJWildCardFileFilter_ is a file filter component that descends from _[TPJFileFilter TPJFileFilter]_ for use with the drop files components that filters files according to a DOS-style wild card.

== Methods ==

|| *Method* || *Description* ||
|| _[TPJWildCardFileFilterAccept Accept]_ || Checks whether a given file or folder passes though the filter. ||

== Properties ==

|| *Property* || *Description* ||
|| _Name_ || Inherited from _TComponent_. See Delphi help for details. ||
|| _Tag_ || Inherited from _TComponent_. See Delphi help for details. ||
|| _[TPJWildCardFileFilterWildCard WildCard]_ || Filters files based on a wildcard string. ||

== Events ==

_TPJWildCardFileFilter_ defines no events.
